actions.text: Referred jointly to the House Committee on House Administration.
Referred jointly to the House Committee on Rules.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Accounts.

official_title: To amend the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act of 1974 to require each item of appropriation in an appropriation measure to be enrolled separately for presentment to the President.

summary.text: Amends the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act of 1974 to require the Secretary of the Senate or the Clerk of the House of Representatives to enroll as a separate bill or joint resolution each item of appropriation in a bill or joint resolution that: (1) originated in the House of the Congress of which such individual is an officer; (2) has been passed by both Houses in the same form; and (3) is an appropriation measure. Prescribes guidelines for the treatment of such separately enrolled items.

titles.title: To amend the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act of 1974 to require each item of appropriation in an appropriation measure to be enrolled separately for presentment to the President.
